## LoaderOptions.memoryAdjustedScreenSpaceError property

Whether to adjust the screen space error to maintain the maximum memory limit - Default `true`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
memoryAdjustedScreenSpaceError?: boolean;
```
